name: Purge System
description:
You are a member of the Grounder Organization called FreeManity.  You are determined to take down Airware Mainframe.  But first, you must find out where it is.

  The Plan:  You have a personality chip for a recently deceased employee (Phil).  You will impersonate him.  Your Mission:  Get Invited over to Bob's House.  You'll have to search around the office for information to help Bob trust you.  Once you have the info you need, talk to Bob to gain his trust, if you can.

In the next episode, once you are at Bob's House, you can install a personality chip in his stasis pod and copy his personality.  Then as Bob, you will have more access to information at The Airware Central Intelligence Agency (ACIA).

FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE:  USE FULL SCREEN
